title: TFT - What do y'all think?

embed.description: With the introduction of Teamfight Tactics, we're excited to bring a whole new personalization option to League: Little Legends. These critters will be your avatar in TFT, dancing, emoting, animating, and generally showing off. After your first few games, you'll unlock your first LL just by playing.

body:
I'm super excited :D. Curious to hear y'alls thoughts, is an auto battler something y'all are excited to play? Which Little Legend is your fav? :D:D:D:D:D:D:D:D:D:D

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
